last_episode_to_air.name: Push the Button
last_episode_to_air.overview: Vlad is determined to push the button on the Antelope's Tail, but Hux and Logan have tracked down his whereabouts. Can they convince Ruth to reactivate Action Team in time to save the world?

name: Action Team
overview: Explosive comedy Action Team follows the exploits of a top-secret team of special agents charged with saving the world.

episodes.name: Abacus
episodes.overview: It’s 007 meets The Naked Gun in a silly sitcom about a group of spies, led by co-writer Tom Davis as in-yer-face agent Logan.

episodes.name: The Antelope's Trail
episodes.overview: Action Team are in a race against time, as they try and wrestle a mysterious evil device, the Antelope's tail, from the clutches of Schevchenko and his stunning but deadly girlfriend, Rebecca Volk. Logan is ordered to seduce Volk for information, so Action Team head to Sofia in Bulgaria to capture the secret device and save the world from destruction.

episodes.name: Mind Games
episodes.overview: Logan is attacked by an Abacus assassin and retribution is on the cards. Vlad continues his plans for domination, but will a secret meeting with the World’s top ten bad guys be his undoing?

episodes.name: Taken
episodes.overview: Logan's girlfriend Samantha has been kidnapped by an Abacus spy. Desperate for her return he looks to Ruth for help but she refuses to fund the mission and has her own agenda - getting her hands on the "Antelope's Tail". In defiance Action Team turn rogue to get Samantha back. Logan and Graham head to Montenegro to track her down, but it seems someone has tipped off the kidnapper.

episodes.name: Super Mega Robot
episodes.overview: Spoof spy action-thriller series following the exploits of a top-secret team of special agents. Ruth Brooks has successfully retrieved the Antelopes Tail. But all is lost for Action Team as they are shut down and Logan is presumed dead.

episodes.name: Push the Button
episodes.overview: Vlad is determined to push the button on the Antelope's Tail, but Hux and Logan have tracked down his whereabouts. Can they convince Ruth to reactivate Action Team in time to save the world?
